name: Sticky Notes
description:
Autolayout Figma sticky notes that can be adjusted according to the text size


--------------------------------


The notes are made as variants and they have the following 3 properties:

Colours: You can change the colour of notes.

Direction: You can change the orientation

Shadow: You can turn the shadow on/off anytime you want


--------------------------------


The colours used in the notes are defined as Colour Styles, and you can change it anytime you want, or add new ones.
